name: Sky Run (Dawn Games Studios)
description:
Sky Run

An Minimal and Silent Endless Runner game in the sky, your goal is to place blocks below the balls to keep it from falling. Be careful you can't go too high or too low or else it's over. Oh and watch out for obstacles.

Developers Message:

This game is currently buggy and has performance issue but we hope you like it and thank you for playing

Credits:

Paulina Riva(PauR) - Creator of the Background Sky Image posted on Open Game Art
